title: Joel Anderson talks USC and UCLA to Big Ten, Conference Realignment, Arch Manning
description:
Bomani Jones and Joel Anderson of Slate get to the news that Pac-12 programs USC and UCLA are heading to the Big Ten starting in 2024, and touch on just how well conference realignment has seemed to work out historically (9:01). That includes Texas' upcoming move to the SEC, and what will become of their latest big time recruit Arch Manning (37:52).
